title: Ratna Haaram: Exquisite Ruby & Emerald Jadau Necklace
features: This breathtaking Haaram features a classic South Indian design with a modern twist. Round Burmese rubies, each meticulously set within a frame of Polki diamonds, form the necklace strand. The pendant showcases a hand-carved emerald, radiating a serene green, surrounded by a halo of sparkling Polki diamonds. The entire piece is crafted using the age-old Jadau technique, showcasing the unmatched skill of our artisans.
colors: and the warm glow of 22K Gold complemented by the brilliance of Polki diamonds.
occasions: and special festive occasions. Also makes a statement piece for high-end cultural events.
